description.description: description filters security groups by description.

id.description: id specifies the ID of a security group to use. If set, id will not be validated before use. An invalid id will result in failure to create a server with an appropriate error message.

limit.description: Deprecated: limit is silently ignored. It has no replacement.

marker.description: Deprecated: marker is silently ignored. It has no replacement.

name.description: name filters security groups by name.

notTags.description: notTags filters by security groups which don't match all specified tags. NOT (t1 AND t2...) Multiple tags are comma separated.

notTagsAny.description: notTagsAny filters by security groups which don't match any specified tags. NOT (t1 OR t2...) Multiple tags are comma separated.

projectId.description: projectId filters security groups by project ID.

sortDir.description: Deprecated: sortDir is silently ignored. It has no replacement.

sortKey.description: Deprecated: sortKey is silently ignored. It has no replacement.

tags.description: tags filters by security groups containing all specified tags. Multiple tags are comma separated.

tagsAny.description: tagsAny filters by security groups containing any specified tags. Multiple tags are comma separated.

tenantId.description: tenantId filters security groups by tenant ID. Deprecated: use projectId instead. tenantId will be ignored if projectId is set.
